npm.npmInstall: ğŸš— please run npm install before npm run dev

root.successfully: ğŸ‰ Create project successfully! Now you can enter

yo.title: Yeoman command
yo.implement: yo mint                                Execute in the root directory, initialize Project
yo.tc: yo mint:tc                             Clone remote template configuration file to generator
yo.sc: yo mint:sc                             Set remote template profile download path
yo.list: yo mint:tpl / yo mint:tpl list         View template configuration
yo.add_tpl: yo mint:tpl add                        Add template configuration
yo.move_tpl: yo mint:tpl move                       Move the template to the specified position
yo.export_tpl: yo mint:tpl export                     Export template to desktop

project.title: Project command
project.startUp: npm run dev     Local development start command
project.lint: npm run lint    Local eslint check
